The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a qualified general contractor for the maintenance services of the Burlington Lift Bridge in Hamilton, Ontario. The period of the resulting contract will be for two years, with possible extensions of 12 months.

### Requirements

The contractor will need to provide all necessary labor, tools, equipment, materials, safety devices, and supervision to ensure the bridge's regular maintenance. This includes:

- Routine inspections and repair services to ensure the bridge's structural integrity.
- Regular maintenance of all bridge systems, including electrical, mechanical, and hydraulics.
- Ensuring compliance with all applicable regulations and standards.
- Providing adequate resources to meet operational requirements.

### Bid Instructions

To participate, interested bidders must submit all required supporting documentation and bids on or before March 7, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST. Late bids will be considered non-responsive.

An optional site visit will be held on February 20, 2024, at 10:00 AM at the Burlington Canal Lift Bridge (1157 Beach Blvd, Hamilton, ON L8H 6Z9). Interested bidders are welcome to attend.
